name: Corona Virus: Save The World
description:
This game in an adventure styled game simulating the Corona Virus situation. In this game your only goal is to get your country out of this devastating situation as good as possible, with the less economical problems, deaths and stress. The situation can go as far as entering a war between countries if you do not manage your country correctly! Many things can go wrong! The virus can mutate for example and increase it's fatality! You can explore all the different combinations and see how they work! Here is your chance to destroy this virus! Of course this game is purely fictional and not everything that happens is real. 

Remember: Together we can beat this virus! With the right decisions and the right motivation!

Make sure to leave a comment in order to tell me if you liked the game or not!

NOTE THAT THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA DEVELOPMENT AND WILL BE UPDATED CONSTANTLY!

THE GAME IS CURRENTLY NOT AVAILAIBLE BECAUSE IT IS BEING UPDATED!

Remember to leave a rating if you liked the game or not!

Music provided by Christos Fanaras
